channel.title: Restoring old server
channel.description:
Well... I searched and couldn't find anything. But in my server when I type a command that doesnt exist like, ::aslkdjasl I crash.
Then I try to login and can't login because I have to wait for a restart.
Do any of you remember how to fix this crash and let me log back in? And the commands so it will ignore unknown commands and not crash me...
Thanks!

item.title: Restoring old server
item.dc:creator: @teken2 teken2
item.description:
